title: The Shyvana Change Makes Pre-6 Solo Dragon Now "Almost Impossible"... A Big Nerf
body:
...call me a noob or whatever alas from what I was able to test with the nerf to her W she doesn't do enough DMG to Dragon now pre 6 (and even if you stack jungle buffs) and you die before you can kill it.  I would call that a preeeeeety big nerf if a jungler cannot solo kill a dragon (as a nerf to map pressure) vs junglers who still can.

RIOT:  "YEA EVERYONE USES {{item:3718}} !!! SO WE MUST NERF ALL OTHER PLAYSTYLES!"

BTW Pre 6 you won't have enough gold for the above item so its "Shyvana buff", assuming that logic is even true, is irrelevant.  Its like every time I start to "L2P" a new champion of mine and RIOT ALWAYS NERFS IT...

Some points to Mention from Below:

>Alas even assuming there is a "way" now to solo dragon lvl 4-6... the point remains that now you have to buy "more stuff" then before to be able to do it: No more early lvl 3 Dragon kills... vs for example a champion such as {{champion:20}}.  Now you have to be so far along in gold early game that you will therefore be around lvl 6 anyways before you can do Dragon... which is generally, especially LCS wise, a time that Dagon is focused upon already.

>Therefore it is a NERF and a change to early gameplay jungle strategies of {{champion:102}} .



Indeed it is so...

replies.body: I've not had any issues soloing it at level 5 with Skirmisher's Sabre and Dagger.  I just take a health potion and make sure I have smite up.

>
> I've not had any issues soloing it.  I just take a health potion and make sure I have smite up.

Again... unless you are doing lots of normal you appear to not have played the 5.13 patch yet.


Even if pots were somehow enough... you would have to have the pots b4 the dragon and of course spend gold on pots that you otherwise would not have needed.  However because having upgraded {{item:1039}} + even 2 {{item:1042}} isn't enough IDK how pots would make a difference.

Before you could do Solo Dragon even without upgraded at lvl 5... and sooner if you had at least  {{item:3706}}.  Now even with jungle buffs included it does not appear to be enough.  The point remains that Shyvana used to be able to easily solo dragon... now as I indicated it is far harder to do so now.

>Whoops - we missed this in the original 5.13 notes. It is now documented. Sorry!

> We'll level with you - just like Xin Zhao with Sated Devourer (context on both below!), Shyvana has shown in playtesting to be a universal nightmare. And no one wants that. ”

> W - Burnout 

>DAMAGE PER SECOND:  20/35/50/65/80 ⇒ 20/33/45/58/70


BTW although this "small change looks small"... if you want to solo Dragon pre 6 (and esp without items) you need every DMG point you can get because you/dragon are like 1-3 hits from killing each other in general.  Now she is just too week to solo kill Dragon even if you have most of the Devour items.
